page.title: 07The Lewes Ten
page.content: The Lewes Ten run was organised by Lewes Athletic Club.It was sponsored by Caffyns Ltd and Intersport,Lewes.It was held on Sunday 14th October,l984, starting at 11am.In 1985 it will be on 6th October.Trophies were presented to the first three men,three male vets., three ladies and three lady vets. One hundred and sixty six runners took part.The oldest person was 68.The winners were S Ryan of Phoenix AC in 59.08 minutes,first lady J Ince of Brighton & Hove AC in 66.49 minutes, first male vet G Ashdown of Brighton & Hove AC and first lady vet S Tait of Lewes AC. The course was over ten miles of tarmac road,chalk track and downland grass.We walked the part of the course that was in our squares,about 7 miles. The first part was a steady climb from the Motor Roads onto the Downs.After
